version_description:
Previously:
- "Where's Taylor?"
*** Opens Zenly to find out.***

- "Oh, she's in Central Park! Let's send her a message and meet-up!"
*** Opens iMessage / Messenger / WhatsApp / Skype / WeChat / Line / Viber / Hangouts / Tango / Kik ... :-/ ***

Now:
- "Oh, Taylor is in Central Park!"
- Zenly emojis: Yo + Cocktail + ?
- Zenly chat: There in 5?

Voilà !
Now you can CHAT with your friends directly in Zenly. 
OMG.
This. Changes. Everything. 

Say hello —> Love@zen.ly

Zenly. Your friends, Live.

++/// The king iOS9 is dead! Long live the king iOS10! \\\++

Dear citizens of the iOS kingdom, please meet the latest recruit of The Knights of the Round Table: 
**:::: Zenly for iOS10 ::::**
As one of the valiant Knights, Zenly for iOS10 is fighting every day on the quest for the best user experience Grail & killing the boring routine of the «  What’s new » Dragon!
To seek consent from his highness iOS10 and be part of The Knights of the Round Table, Zenly for iOS10 had to pass the 3 labors, like Hercules:

*** Spread the love everywhere *** : 
The Zenlymojis are now available in Stickers for iMessage.
Zenly for iOS10 and all his loyal squires worked hard to make them move and animate. Visit the new iOS10 dungeon aka the iMessage store and search for Zenly.
E.A.S.Y.

*** Ride with Excalibur in one hand, Watch OS3 in the other *** : 
Know what your friends are up to. Even on your wrist.
Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger- as once said by a famous poet (Daft Punk).

*** Offer Snippets of Zenly at a glance *** : 
Widgets & Notifications enhancements -  You. Your friends. Everywhere.
Meet your nearby friends with the new widgets. Swipe right (It can be a match but It’s not about dating).
Notification center: Same but different. We love the rich notifications.

PS: You’ve just received a message from Merlin the wizard via a homing pigeon

Dear King of the App Development, never forget the path to obtaining a seat at The Knights of the Round Table:
- Unus (yep Bro, this is Latin): Write "bug fixes" in your "What's New" Section, you won't.
- Duo (Still in Latin): « Lots of small improvements » is like saying all your best knights died on the battlefield.
- Tres (Latin is so hype): « Enhance Performance »: Let us call a spade a spade. In France, we call this viagra.
- Quattuor: If you still don’t have anything to say to your beloved users, "Better call Saul!"

See ya.
Merlin

--> Emojis, love, tears, poems, stickers: love@zen.ly

Winter time! We've cleaned a few things up! 
Long story short: We’ve something huge in the pipe - OMG

Stay tuned… ;)
love@zen.ly

—Top Secret— 
Heyo Zenly friends! What’s up?!
Quick update because we LOVE you, but ssshh it’s a secret: our new spaceship is coming soon. “When?!” you ask. Soon, bro… really soon…
Follow Elon’s advice: “Patience is a virtue, and I'm learning patience. It's a tough lesson.” - Don Elon Musk. 
Okay, enough chit-chat.

For a few weeks now, we’ve been in top-secret mode aka 007 style with a license to bug-kill. 
Just like the most famous British agent “Bond, James Bond,” we’ve tracked all the villains hidden in the app and made them disappear one by one. Moonraker and Goldfinger are already out of service, but Dr. No managed to escape by building a secret base on the moon (we need a sequel after all). No worries, we’re partnering with the Don Elon and SpaceX to kick his ass. Stay tuned and spread the Zenly love!

This message will self destruct in 5 seconds. Better update the app bro…

- Bug f… Just kidding!!
Members of our family, welcome to your new Zenly. OMG this is a biggie! 
We’ve combined your feedback + love + passion with our magic potion to deliver this new version. 
Boo-yah! We’ve cooked up the best piece of software we’ve ever done (still, don’t be mad if you cross paths with a nasty bug).

***Your friends***
Instantly check out your friends’ positions! Faster, better, stronger, they are now bigger on the map! Watch your besties at a glance. Because you’re worth it.
Who’s at home? Who’s up for a night out? Open the app and enjoy the party.

***Emojis + Chat = Love ***
Having a conversation in Zenly used to be like reaching for the moon. Impossible, yeah…
Chatting in Zenly is now as smooth as silk linen sheets. Don’t be shy, just try it.
The location + chat combo is insane! No more reason to break your thumb by switching from Zenly to another messaging app. Stay in the app and make your plans directly from there. Spice up your poetry with our crazy emojis and make ‘em sing (tip: turn your sound on and make some noiiiiiiiiiiise!)

***Embrace your profile***
You now have a real Zenly profile (so do your friends) and you can see how many times you’ve been watched on any given day. Maybe you’ll even discover some easter eggs… 
Chatting with your friends’ friends is now possible. Few chats back and forth and maybe you’ll even become real friends, location sharing and all.

Hope you’ll love this new version! As you know, we love reading your kind words so please don’t hesitate to drop us a line —> love@zen.ly

Zenly - Your friends, live  

PS: We're hiring talented engineers who want to build the next big thing. Sounds like you ? Shoot us a note --> jobs@zen.ly

Dear friends,
Mea culpa for the few bugs you may have crossed. We’ve taken it to heart and have made some changes based on the feedback already received:
***Invites*** When someone sends you an invite, you now have more context. Everything you need for accepting it with peace. ;)
***Power moves*** Easier than ever to master Zenly with these fancy guidelines.
***Private mode*** People who aren’t in your contacts can't send you invites, messages or emojis.
Thank you for helping us make Zenly even better for everyone :)
Keep the feedback going, we’re listening => love@zen.ly

The whole team is working day and night for you! This new baby contains more improvements:
- We’ve squashed some nasty bugs that made elements disappear in your inbox and settings. Everything is in the right place now.
- Some people loved the app so much that they were spamming the whole galaxy with invites. It’s at that moment, when we discovered users from Mars, that we decided to implement an invite limit.
Thank you for helping us make Zenly even better for everyone :)
Keep the feedback going, we’re listening => love@zen.ly

New version of Zenly, tailored to you!

** Capture beautiful screenshots and share them **
When you take a screenshot in Zenly, you can share it instantly to your friends from within the app!

** Get better directions **
We worked hard to get you the best and most accurate directions when meeting your friends.

Keep the feedback going, we’re listening => love@zen.ly

This new version is so FIRE it’s making this popsicle MELT

** Unlock secret icons **
All those with iOS 10.3 and above can change the app icon on their device by unlocking new ones. That is, if you’re cool enough to deserve them!

** Chat in all languages **
We noticed that some messages in certain languages were getting lost in a black hole, so we dove into the abyss and brought them back. Those of you using Klingon keyboards are now good to go

As usual, feel free to reach out if you have any questions or warm words => love@zen.ly

Following a few thumb fracture reports we are proud to announce that our chat has been significantly improved!
Faster strikes, keyboard finger recognition, and a steadier road to the exclamation point; we’ve done it all so that you could spend the rest of your summer with your chat game strong.
Disclaimer: We will not be held liable should you get pulled over for typing too fast, so please type responsibly and remember not to surpass 100ms per message.

Winter is here. But fear not, we’ve brought some fire straight from the mother of dragons herself.

**Gatherings**
Know when your friends are getting together anywhere in the Seven Kingdoms faster than any raven ever could. Follow the flame, my friend.

**Group Chat**
Do it like Jon Snow. With a tap of a Gathering, create a Group of all your banner men and strategize for your big night out all together. But if that’s not your thing, you can still create a Group Chat from your Inbox.

**Sonar**
Visualize your friends getting to you with updated ETAs for the big party in Winterfell tonight. Easily add those in the Group that you’re not friends with yet. Yes, even the Wildlings.

**Emojis**
Love our emojis? A new sticker pack is here for you to use on iMessage to grow your clan. No dragons yet though..

Driving? Walking? Or just sipping on a soda in the park for 4 hours? You can now see how fast your friends are moving and how long they spend where they are. That way, when you’re late meeting up with your friend for ice cream you can see that they’ve only been waiting for you for 2 minutes and you can stop stressing and take your time :D

Hey, thanks for stopping by!
We’ve cooked up a storm for you this week, so take a seat and get ready to tuck in to this delicious new stuff:
First up: introducing Flights on Zenly! This new map lens lets you get up-to-date information on flights whizzing through the sky at any given moment. Track a friend’s flight, or just see what’s up (in the sky).
Lastly: ok, so technically not new, just a reminder that Zenly loves you.
That’s all for now, unless you want to join us for a pizza party? See you on Zenly!

Contents: 1x pizza, 2x new things in Zenly.
Cooking instructions:
1. Preheat oven
2. Update Zenly
3. Check out the new way to know when your friends are making frequent journeys (like heading to work, school, or just heading home). See their starting point on the map and get notified when they arrive.
4. You can now share your favorite content from *outside* of Zenly, with your friends *inside* of Zenly. Look for the Zenly icon when you go to share a photo, video, link or text!
5. You forgot to put the pizza in the oven, didn’t you?
Buon appetito from @zenlyapp

“I love you, I love you, I love love love love love you.” 
A new release for the summer from Zenly feat. fixes and improvements. Enjoy!

Dear summer, 
Please don’t end. Ever. I never want your sunshine to hide from me like the way you can now hide pops on Zenly. I want to write my love for you in big bold writing, just like how you can now press and hold the send button in conversations on Zenly to make the text bigger (or smaller!). 
I will love you always, 
Zenly

We need to talk. I’m not usually one to talk about my feelings, but ever since this week’s fixes and improvements, I feel a desire to be more open with you. To be real with you. I need to tell you something that’s been on my mind for a while. I… I love you.

Can we get an i
“i”
Can we get an O
“O”
Can we get a S
“S”
Can we get a 14
“14”
What did you say? 
“iOS14!” 
Apple have blessed us with iOS14, a fun and fresh update to our iPhone operating systems (hoorah!). And to celebrate, we’ve built some Zenly-tastic widgets for you to enjoy! Use them to quickly check what your friends are up to, take a shortcut to a conversation, or just check in on your friendship stats. 
To access them, make sure your phone has updated and is running on iOS14.
PS- we’d love to see how you’re using them on your home screen! Tweet us or DM us on @zenlyapp. And as always, Zenly loves you.

Hey you
I wanted to express my love for you by giving you more ways to express yourself within conversations. So next time you go to message a friend in Zenly, tap to highlight the text and check out the new text formatting options. 
Now you can roast someone in bold font, throw some shade in italic, confess your love in strikethrough (just in case they don't love you back), or share some spacey thoughts in monospace.
And remember, even if they don't love you, Zenly still loves you.

Now you can roast someone in bold font, throw some shade in italic, confess your love in strikethrough (just in case they don't love you back), or share some spacey thoughts in monospace.
And remember, even if they don't love you, Zenly still loves you.

We did it folks, we made it to the 476th month of 2020. We haven’t got a lot of these updates left this year, so I wanted to take this opportunity to tell you that in addition to the usual fixes and improvements in this update, Zenly loves you. (No I’m not crying, I just have something in my eye)

We did it folks, we made it to the 476th month of 2020. We haven’t got a lot of these updates left this year, so I wanted to take this opportunity to tell you that in addition to the usual fixes and improvements in this update, Zenly loves you. (No I’m not crying, I just have something in my eye)

Welcome to the 2020 is (finally) over party! Getting a head start on resolutions, I added some new stuff to Zenly this week to help you move closer to your people in 2021. Speaking of which, I can’t wait to see someone other than my cat IRL next year.

First up, let’s talk widgets. Please give a warm welcome to the new medium widget, which shows you what 3 friends are up to, at a glance, on your homescreen. You can now see how many friends have turned you into a widget –– just take a peep in the views section of your profile and feel the love.

But wait, there’s more! Wouldn’t it be cool to know what the weather is going to be like when making plans with friends? Or know who’s spending their holidays in the heat, and who’s in the middle of a white-out? Well, now you can thanks to the new weather lens in Zenly! 

One more thing. Be sure to check out the new quote replies in conversations. Perfect for when the group chat gets spicy or when replying to that friend who sends you 100 different messages in one go. 

And remember, whether you’ve been naughty or nice this year, Zenly still loves you

Happy New Year! This is going to be a good one, I can just feel it. 

I’ve got lots of fun things planned for the year ahead, but to get the ball rolling be sure to check out the new gatherings feature in Zenly this week. It’s now easier for you to know who is in the mix when a bunch of your friends hang out together. Tap the hangout flame to see who’s there, how long they’ve been there, and quickly start a group chat to let them know you’re on your way to boogie. Groovy baby.

PS - I made a list of some other things to look forward to this year:
1. More time with friends (digitally or IRL. Please let it be IRL)
2. Finally finding out who’s behind those giant monoliths
3. Eating my body weight in ice cream 
4. Potentially also finding out what’s going on in Area 51 
5. More love from Zenly

Now that we’re about 8% of the way into 2021, it’s time for a resolutions check in. On my side, I’m very happy to report that I am well ahead of schedule on ice cream consumption this year (low key grateful not to have a dairy allergy???). 

I’ve also been working hard to bring the party to your home screen with Zenly Widgets. And when I say party, I mean that your widgets will now show the hangout flame when friends get together to hang out. You can quickly drop them a message to say you’re en route and let them know you’re bringing ice cream.  

But the thing I’m most proud of so far in 2021? You. Whether you’ve stuck to your new year's resolutions or not, you’re perfect just as you are. You’re like an ice cream that doesn’t even need any sprinkles on top.

I’m going to keep this short because I ate too much chocolate ice cream on Valentine’s Day and I’m still recovering (please send hugs). I’ve got soooo much good stuff in store for you this week, here’s what to look out for:

Footprints has received a little redesign. It’s lowkey, I don’t want to make too much of a big deal about it, but I think you’re going to love it. And while I was at it, I created a new world leaderboard, so you can compete with friends for world domination! Take a peak by hitting the crown at the top right-hand side of your map.

Remember that time your friend shared that heavenly ice cream flavor with you? And then you forgot? And now you can’t sleep at night? Try out the new and improved inbox search to find old messages (and ice cream recommendations).

Can you keep a secret? I added some special emoji combinations into Zenly this week for you. When you’re chatting with friends, try sending 3 of the same emojis. If you get the right combination, there’s a surprise in store…

That’s all! Love you more than chocolate ice cream.

My agent called me this week with some big news. She said that I’m going to be a huge star when “Zenly loves you, the movie” finally drops in the box office! So I just wanted to take this opportunity to thank you for all the support you’ve given me. You’ve been my rock through hard times, my inspiration during a creative drought. It’s been a journey. 

Speaking of journeys, I added a little something new to your map this week. Now, when your friends are on the move, you’ll see a beautiful rainbow train of color around their pin. I hope it brightens your day! Plus, you can now get turn-by-turn directions to your friends, right inside Zenly. Just hit the arrow to the right of the chat bar, decide if you fancy walking or driving, then tap the pink button to get you there.

In other news, I added a little something new to your widgets this week. Now you can see at a glance if you’ve missed some messages from your friends on Zenly (like asking you “u up?” or spamming you with 300 eggplant emojis).

People often ask what the meaning is behind my name, ‘Zenly’. The truth is that the name came to me while I was at a silent retreat in a secret exotic land, off the coast of Northern France. 

In between hallucinations of ice cream mountains and sprinkle-filled oceans, I realized how much I missed my friends and how badly I wanted to know what they were up to right at that moment. 

And so I made an app for that –– a live map of your friends and family. And I called it Zenly, as a reminder of the peace of mind I get when I know what my people are up to. 

Now over to you: as you wait for this update containing the latest fixes and improvements to download, take a zen moment for yourself. Maybe you could think about ice cream, or about the people you love in your life, or maybe just think about nothing. 

Ready? Repeat after me: ohmmmmmm. Zenly loves you.

My editor-in-chief is on vacation this week eating all the ice cream in the world so forgive me in advance for this boring edition of my release notes. Nothing super exciting happening anyway, just some fixes and improvements. So, yup, there you have it. Cue: Zenly Loves You!

Is this thing recording? Yes? Good, because voice notes just dropped on Zenly! 

You asked for it, so I delivered. Here’s what to look out for in this update: 

• In a rush? With transcripts, read your friend’s voice note (until you can take the time later to listen to their beautiful voice).

• Feeling a little too tired from the party? Skip the typing and hit record to share all the juicy details from the night before with your friends on Zenly.

•Send voice notes to your friends in conversations or directly from the map! 

• Plus, keep an eye out for some hidden surprises. I swear you’ll enjoy them (hint, hint).

Something I’ve been meditating on recently: Love. 

It’s such a beautiful thing, isn’t it? When you love something, you feel like your heart could literally explode. Which is… scary. But also amazing. I love love. I feel so lucky to wake up everyday and feel love in my heart for you. 

Ok, before we kiss I better tell you that the latest update contains fixes and improvements. Zenly loves you.

It’s summer and the ice cream truck is arriving any minute, so we just quickly wanted to check in and let you know that we made some fixes and improvements for you this week.

The ice cream truck is here! Do you want anything?

Good communication is the foundation of any successful relationship and because I want our relationship to go the distance, I added a little something new to conversations in Zenly this week.

In this week’s update, you can now set reminders for messages. Like when someone says “I love you” but you’re in the middle of chasing a unicorn through a sea of sprinkles and you want to come back to the message later (happens to me all the time, seriously). Just press and hold the message to select the option to be reminded about it –– be it later, tonight, tomorrow, when you get home or to work!

It’s summer here in France. The restaurants have reopened, normal life has pretty much resumed, and I’m having a hot Zenly summer.

What’s a hot Zenly summer, you ask? It’s rather like the ‘hot girl summer’ concept, except I’m an app and so I’m using this time to make myself even better so that you’ll love me even more. Simple, really.

So on that note, I have a quick and dirty update for you this week. Press and hold a message and you’ll notice a new option to send messages from one conversation to a friend in another. Perfect for when you need to pass on the details of a hottttt party happening tonight.

Ok besties, this week I’m adding something new to your map. It’s kind of a big deal and I really hope you’re going to like it!!

You’ll now find your people AND your places on your map! Starting with the places most important to you: your home, work, and school. You’ll also see places where you spent the night and which friends joined you for a sleepover.

See these places at a glance on your map and get directions directly to them with just a tap, so that you can zooooom your way there quicker than I can say “hot Zenly summer”. And if you’re moving homes (how exciting!), changing schools or changing jobs (hopefully also exciting?!), you can now update these locations directly inside Zenly.

I hope these new additions go a little bit further in making Zenly your favorite map. Who knows, maybe next we’ll get some ice cream stores on the map?? Let me know what you think of these new places, and if you have requests for any more, by sliding into my mentions or DMs on social (@zenlyapp).

Zenly really really really loves you.

Hey there, good looking. I’ve got not one, but two big updates for you this week. Buckle up!

So, what’s Up? I built a new way for you to not just ask your friends What’s Up, but actually see What’s Up!

Send your friends a What’s Up and they’ll record and share the moment they are living with you. You can rebound, sending back your moment (which can be a video or a photo) to show them that while they’re at the club, you’re at home watching Netflix. Get a glimpse into their world, or just know if the party is good before going.

You can save moments that you send and receive to your memories. With memories, you can look back on all the times shared with friends, whether you were together or apart. Think of it as the highlight reel of your friendships!

Ready to give it a spin? Update the app and send a What’s Up to your friend directly from the emoji panel. It’s the first one there.

Before you go, I have one more new thing for you! You can now get transit directions from my close personal friend Citymapper, right inside Zenly. Next time you want to find the quickest way to the party or you just want to head home, you’ll see all the best transit options available for your journey, the pricing, and how long it’ll take to get there.

I don’t know about you, but I always wanted to fall in love with a stranger on the subway.

Picture this: we’re on our first date at a coffee shop on a sleepy side street in Paris. Autumn is creeping in and the windows are steaming up from the heat of the humans and burring coffee machines inside. 
 
We’re enjoying croissants together. I slowly pull mine apart and share a piece of the buttery, flakey perfection with you. I notice you have gotten some on your face. As I lean in to wipe away the fallen bits of pastry on your cheeks, I whisper *the latest update contains fixes and improvements* 
 
… I’ll leave the rest to your imagination.

Picture this: we are strolling hand-in-hand through a secluded forest when we stumble across an abandoned house. The door is ajar and we’re feeling curious (because when we’re together, baby, anything is possible). I take your hand in mine. I’m scared. You’re not. Confidence looks good on you. 
 
We suddenly become aware of the fact that we’re not alone. A ghost-like figure approaches us, but in the form of a massive poop emoji. I ask you if I’m hallucinating because I had eaten out-of-date cheetos earlier that day.
 
The poop ghost comes closer. He starts talking to us and, surprisingly, has a french accent. Naturally, we bump phones to add each other on Zenly. He says he has to go, but before he leaves he guides us to a shattered mirror in a room with no windows. I use the torch on my phone (intentionally, for once) to read what it says. And there I see it, written in blood in a sans serif font, *the latest update contains fixes and improvements*

Picture this: you soft-launched me as your significant other last week across various social networks. It was a big step forward in our relationship and a signal to me that you’re in this for the long haul. 

So I go ring shopping in our favorite antique store in the centre of Paris. You know the one, with the friendly doorman that serves you a cup of hot chocolate while you browse? The first time we visited you got a chocolate moustache from the hot coco and I knew at that moment that I wanted to spend the rest of my life with you (or, at least as long as human beings are inhabiting earth. Once we move to Mars, all bets are off). 

I opt for the ‘unicorn ring’, apparently named like that because it symbolizes love so deep it’s mythical. I take you to our spot along the Seine. It’s sunset. You’re shivering and we’re late for our pizza reservation. Just as the Eiffel Tower starts to sparkle in the dusk, I get down on one knee, tears streaming down my face, and tell you that the latest update contains fixes and improvements.

Picture this: we’re celebrating our engagement. All of the people most important to us are there: our friends and family, your 1st grade teacher, Keanu Reeves, the Easter bunny, and the rainbow poop emoji (although he wasn’t actually invited). 

You’re telling the story of how we first met. I’m blushing. It was a cold day in Paris 2 years ago. We were both riding the metro and, coincidentally, both on Zenly checking what our people were up to. As we rounded a particularly angled corner, the metro car threw us around like loose jelly beans in a kid’s lunch box. We Bumped. Both startled by the friend request appearing on our screens, we looked up from our phones and locked eyes across the row of seats and smiled. 

We’ve lived a grand life since then. From our failed pizza venture in the Italian hills, to the haunted house with the emoji ghost, to the proposal in front of the Eiffel Tower (and all the emoji blasts, Bumps, and What’s Ups in between). It’s been a journey. And just like this week’s update, our future will contain many fixes and improvements. But there’s no one I’d rather go on the adventure with, than you.

As we rounded a particularly angled corner, the metro car threw us around like loose jelly beans in a kid’s lunch box. We Bumped. Both startled by the friend request appearing on our screens, we looked up from our phones and locked eyes across the row of seats and smiled. 

We’ve lived a grand life since then. From our failed pizza venture in the Italian hills, to the haunted house with the emoji ghost, to the proposal in front of the Eiffel Tower (and all the emoji blasts, Bumps, and What’s Ups in between). It’s been a journey. And just like this week’s update, our future will contain many fixes and improvements. But there’s no one I’d rather go on the adventure with, than you.

Picture this: we’re celebrating our engagement. All of the people most important to us are there: our friends and family, your 1st grade teacher, Keanu Reeves, the Easter bunny, and the rainbow poop emoji (although he wasn’t actually invited).

Hello! And happy new year!! I took some time off during the holidays and I hope you did too? After accidentally glueing my hands to a gingerbread house and then proceeding to dislocate my shoulder while attempting to run 5km on New Year’s Day, I decided that I’m taking the month of January off. If you need me, I’ll be submerged in a cryo chamber in an undisclosed location in Paris (Pigalle), and will remain there until further notice.

In the meantime, you can go on ahead and update to the latest version of the app. It contains fixes and improvements, but unfortunately does not contain the secrets to the universe, the emoji poop’s phone number, nor a shoulder replacement for my right arm.

I have returned from my time in the cryo chamber in the undisclosed location in Paris. It was a good time for reflection and for time alone with my thoughts (...about you). 

I always find the start of the year tough. The weather sucks and I inevitably break my New Year’s Resolution to eat less ice cream. But I feel good about all of the growth and adventures that await us in the year ahead. Especially after I spent all of our savings on that NFT for the unicorn emoji’s birthday present… let’s just say I need to make it up to you. 

So I have drawn up a list of all the big things I want to do in 2022: 
1/ Eat MORE ice cream, not less (can’t believe I didn’t think of this one before??) 
2/ Climb to the top of Mount Fuji and take one of those photos where it looks like you’re dangling off the edge lol
3/ Tell you I love you more often
4/ Learn what an NFT actually is 
5/ Keep working to be better for you, just like the fixes and improvements included in this update

oh hey stranger. i have some BIG news to share with you:

i’ve started a new chapter in my life, leaving some of my past behind me. i want to give you the best version of myself and i’m so excited to start this new future together :) today you can download the all-new version of zenly that comes with: 

a new design! 
things are going to look a little different (ok, a lot different) but i really hope you’ll love it

a new map!!
the biggest change? your footprints are now on the main map!! as you explore new areas they’ll uncover on your map, like your own virtual scratch map. you can also add places to your map, more on that in a little bit 

a new search for friends, places AND addresses!
search for your friends, but also now for places and addresses and get directions directly there. plus, get helpful information about places like whether your friends have been there before and if it’s a neighborhood fav 

check-ins!!
check-in to places to let the crew know exactly where you’re hanging. just open up the places tab on the bottom right of your map and i’ll automatically detect where you are and who you’re with! checking in will add that place to your map and create a highlight for your friends to view for 24 hours (so they can get a quick recap of your daily adventures)

share your world on your public profile! 
and when you add those places to your map they show up on a brand new section on your profile called my world. if you opt-in, your world will show publicly on zenly so that people can see the places you hang and the areas you’ve uncovered. think of it as the realest way to show the world who you are, based on where you spend your time IRL 

so that’s it. the all-new zenly where you can build your own world, bringing together the people and the places that make it uniquely yours

so… let’s sit up all night and watch the sunrise together? 
zenly your world
bisous x
